person.persName: Francis M. Glass (Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Alexander Glass and Elizabeth Glass. Married to Margaret Barrett Glass on April 1, 1857. Father of Alexander Glass, Jr., Jefferson D. Glass, and John R. Glass. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 28; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 47; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, District 1, p. 40; Jordan Dodd, comp., Kentucky Marriages, 1851-1900 Ancestry, Lyon County, Kentucky, April 1, 1857.
